articles.author: Kate Abnett, Gloria Dickie
articles.title: This year 'virtually certain' to be warmest in 125000 years, EU scientists say - Reuters
articles.description: This year is "virtually certain" to be the warmest in 125,000 years, European Union scientists said on Wednesday, after data showed last month was the world's hottest October in that period.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, Nov 8 (Reuters) - This year is "virtually certain" to be the warmest in 125,000 years, European Union scientists said on Wednesday, after data showed last month was the world's hottest Octo… [+3806 chars]
